body: gay fat men make me go brrrrrrr

I HATE FAT PEOPLE SO MUCH, LIKE I HATE HOW MUCH SPACE THEY OCCUPIED AND HOW THEY GET EXHAUSTED OVER THE SMALLEST TASKS THAT EVEN A 3 YEAR OLD COULD DO WITHOUT ANY COMPLICATIONS. I KNOW THAT EATING HEALTHY SOMETIMES ISN'T EASY BUT TF THEIR WHOLE DIET IS BASED OF MC DONALDS AND KFC AND A LOT OF THEM REACT NEGATIVELY IF U SAY THAT THEY NEED TO LOSE SOME WEIGHT, SOME OF THEM WILL EVEN CALL U FAT PHOBIC I KNOW THAT DISCRIMINATION AGAINST FAT PEOPLE IS A REAL PROBLEM BUT THEY DIDN'T HAVE TO MAKE AN ENTIRELY NEW WORD FOR IT

I hate fat people so much, like I hate how much space they occupied and how they get exhausted over the smallest tasks that even a 3 year old could do without any complications. I know that eating healthy sometimes isn't easy but tf their whole diet is based of mc donalds and kfc and a lot of them react negatively if u say that they need to lose some weight, some of them will even call u fat phobic I know that discrimination against fat people is a real problem but they didn't have to make an entirely new word for it
